doc.after: The treaties declare that the EU itself is founded on the values of respect for human dignity freedom democracy equality the rule of law and respect for human rights including the rights of persons belonging to minorities in a society in which pluralism non discrimination tolerance justice solidarity and equality between women and men prevail 109
